posts.name: Capital City BBQ
posts.note: Capital City BBQ is homey eatery preparing smoked meats with signature sauces and Vietnamese classics like pho and banh mi. Capital City BBQ, serves old southern BBQ and Vietnamese cuisine in one restaurant and is located inside of a cellular store. From their website, 'All our food is homemade, and our specialties include Texas-style brisket, North Carolina pulled pork, Kansas City baby back ribs, rib tips, baked mac ‘n’ cheese, and cornbread, as well as our spectacular Vietnamese Pho and Banh Mi dishes. We also have amazing vegan options.' You need to order the beef brisket banh mi.

posts.name: The Cosmos
posts.note: The Cosmos is a funky parlor offering wood-fired pizzas amid space-themed murals, plus arcade games, and a patio. From their website, 'Mind-erasingly good pizza pies hyperthermatically-scorched in a wood-fired oven from the galactic beyond. Tremble, Earthlings!' Food Network said 'Try any of their creative offerings or opt for the “Trust Us” and let them bring out a surprise offering that will wow you or The Spaceball (meatball) sub.'

posts.name: Kings Bakery
posts.note: Kings Bakery specializes in Mediterranean gourmet flatbreads and sandwiches. They are known for our phenomenal shawarmas and Manou-wiches(cheese bread sandwiches).
posts.rcmmnd: David Chang's Netflix show Ugly Delicious

posts.name: Ochre Bakery
posts.note: From the Ochre Bakery website, 'Ochre is a bakery and cafe born out of Astro Coffee in Corktown, Detroit. Built around a love of food -- and sharing it with the people around us -- our food is wholesome, simple, fresh and nourishing. The menu is inspired by the seasons and the bounty of our local farmers. We are driven by a commitment to quality and sustainability, and we believe that the best quality bread and pastries (and everything else we make) begin with the best quality ingredients. We are committed to using organic and local products as much as we can for the health of our community and the planet.'

posts.name: The Purple Carrot
posts.note: The Purple Carrot is dedicated to the farm-to-table concept which we are always thrilled to experience. Try the potato bites.

posts.name: Schvitz Health Club
posts.note: From the Schvitz Health Club website, 'Open to members and guests since 1930, The Schvitz is Detroit’s original urban health club and the only historic bathhouse left in the city. A storied landmark and cultural institution for nearly 100 years, this old-world oasis still offers the very best in ancient heat therapies and holistic healing. Great food and camaraderie will complete your restorative stay. Come unwind, back in time.' From the Netflix show starring David Chang, they serve steaks and other sides.
posts.rcmmnd: David Chang's Netflix show Ugly Delicious

posts.name: Union Woodshop
posts.note: Union Woodshop serves slow-smoked BBQ, wood-fired pizza, and craft beers draw crowds to this hip rustic space. You need to order the Porker, which has a house-ground pork patty, house-made Michigan maple bacon and house-made hotlinks or any of their other BBQ: brisket, chicken, and pork.

posts.name: Warda Patisserie
posts.note: From the Detroit News website about Warda Patisserie, 'Warda Bouguettaya talks about using Michigan produce for her baked creations with such passion you can almost taste the fresh, seasonal bounty. A self-described “complete nerd” when it comes to pastries, Bouguettaya has been cooking and baking in Detroit for a while, and in November her business Warda Patisserie joined forces with established art space and music venue Trinosophes just outside Eastern Market on Gratiot.'

posts.name: Zaytoon Mediterranean
posts.note: Zaytoon Mediterranean serves Shawarma, falafel, and other Mediterranean staples round out the menu at this relaxed counter serve. You should order the grape leaves.
